response.overview: The Fantastic Mr. Fox, bored with his current life, plans a heist against the three local farmers. The farmers, tired of sharing their chickens with the sly fox, seek revenge against him and his family.
response.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox

titles.title: ファンタスティックMr. FOX
